europeana:record.dc:title: Herpetozoa 10_1_2 (1997)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Capula Massimo, Filippi Ernesto, Foufopoulos Johannes, Gemel Richard, Kuzmin Sergius L., Luiselli Luca M., Rödel Mark-Oliver, Rugiero Lorenzo, Schmidtler Josef Friedrich, Schwarzer Udo, Trujillo Jesus Veronica, Vogrin Nusa
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Johannes Foufopoulos: The reptile fauna of the Northern Dodecanese (Aegean Islands, Greece). 3- 12. Udo Schwarzer: Freilandbeobachtungen an der Kapuzennatter, Macroprotodon cucullatus ibericus Busack & McCoy, 1990 in Südwest Portugal (Squamata: Serpentes: Colubridae). 13- 21. Mark-Oliver Rödel: Lebensräume und Entwicklung junger Starrbrust-Pelomedusen Pelomedusa subrufa olivacea (Schweigger, 1812) im Comoé-Nationalpark, Elfenbeinküste (Testudines: Pelomedusidae). 23- 33. Josef Friedrich Schmidtler: Die Ablepharus kitaibelii - Gruppe in Süd-Anatolien und benachbarten Gebieten (Squamata: Sauria: Scinidae). 35- 63. Massimo Capula, Ernesto Filippi, Luca M. Luiselli, Veronica Trujillo Jesus: The ecology of the Western Whip Snake, Coluber viridiflavus (Lacépède, 1789), in Mediterranean Central Italy (Squamata: Serpentes: Colubridae). 65- 79. Lorenzo Rugiero: On the ecology and phenology of Chalcides chalcides (Linnaeus, 1758) in Central Italy (Squamata: Sauria: Scinidae). 81- 84. Nusa Vogrin: On the herpetofauna of Lake Vrana and its vicinity (Dalmacia, Croatia) (Amphibia, Reptilia). 85- 88. Nusa Vogrin: A new record of the Common Spadefoot Pelobates fuscus fuscus (Laurenti, 1768), in Slovenia (Anura: Pelobatidae). 89- 90. Richard Gemel: Langjährige Gefangenschaftshaltung einer Breitrandschildkröte, Testudo marginata Schoepf, 1792 (Testudines: Testudinidae). 91- 92. Sergius L. Kuzmin: Advances in Amphibian Research in the Former Soviet Union. A new journal. 93- 94
